plurals.name: input_password_after_timeout_msg
plurals.item: Enter your password at least once every %d hours to always remember it
Enter your password at least once every %d hour to always remember it

plurals.name: input_pattern_after_timeout_msg
plurals.item: Enter your password at least once every %d hours to always remember it
Enter your password at least once every %d hour to always remember it

plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message
plurals.item: Enter SIM PIN. You have %d remaining attempts.
Enter SIM PIN. You have %d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message_multi_sim
plurals.item: Enter SIM%1$d PIN, you have %2$d remaining attempts.
Enter SIM%1$d PIN, you have %2$d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_puk_message
plurals.item: SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact carrier for details.
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempt before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact carrier for details.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempts.
Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code_multi_sim
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM%1$d PIN code, you have %2$d remaining attempts.
Incorrect SIM%1$d PIN code, you have %2$d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d remaining attempt before SIM becomes permanently unusable.

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_password
plurals.item: "Device hasn't been unlocked for %d hours. Confirm password."
"Device hasn't been unlocked for %d hour. Confirm password."

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_pattern
plurals.item: "Device hasn't been unlocked for %d hours. Confirm pattern."
"Device hasn't been unlocked for %d hour. Confirm pattern."

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_pin
plurals.item: "Device hasn't been unlocked for %d hours. Confirm PIN."

plurals.name: user_limit_reached_message
plurals.item: You can add up to %d users.
Only one user can be created.
